Package com.PDLB.PPE.API.service

Class WalletService

java.lang.Object
com.PDLB.PPE.API.service.WalletService
@Service public class WalletService extends Object
This service class provides methods for managing wallets and their associated data.

    • createWallet

      public String createWallet(String buildingId, String customerId)
      Creates a new wallet.
      Parameters:
      buildingId - The building id
      customerId - the customer id
      Returns:
      The id of the wallet.

    • getAllWallets

      public ArrayList<WalletDto> getAllWallets()
      Retrieves all wallets.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of WalletDto objects representing the wallets.

    • getWalletById

      public WalletDto getWalletById(String id)
      Retrieves a wallet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the wallet to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A WalletDto object representing the wallet.

    • getWalletByCustomerId

      public ArrayList<WalletDto> getWalletByCustomerId(String customerId, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves all wallets for a given customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to retrieve wallets for.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of WalletDto objects representing the wallets.

    • countWalletByCustomerId

      public int countWalletByCustomerId(String customerId)
      Retrieves the count of wallets associated with a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer for whom wallets are counted.
      Returns:
      The count of wallets associated with the specified customer.

    • objectsCreator

      private ArrayList<WalletDto> objectsCreator(ArrayList<Wallet> wallets, String customerId)
      Creates a list of WalletDto objects based on the provided list of wallets and customer ID.
      Parameters:
      wallets - The list of wallets to be converted to WalletDto objects.
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with the wallets, or null if not applicable.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing WalletDto objects corresponding to the input wallets.

    • objectCreator

      private WalletDto objectCreator(Wallet wallet, String customerId)
      Creates a WalletDto object from the given Wallet object, customer ID, and additional related data.
      Parameters:
      wallet - The Wallet object to be converted into a WalletDto.
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with the wallet, or null if not applicable.
      Returns:
      A WalletDto object representing the input wallet with additional related data.
